name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Drupal Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in delivering high-quality, secure, and performant applications in compliance with industry standards including **FedRAMP**, **FISMA**, and **Section 508**. My technical proficiency encompasses **Drupal**, **Cypress**, and **Apache JMeter**, facilitating seamless Test Automation, Performance Testing, API Testing, and Database Testing. I have a strong understanding of Agile methodologies and defect tracking systems, ensuring efficient project management and continuous improvement.
My background includes extensive work in the healthcare and financial sectors, employing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for full-stack development. I possess significant cloud experience in both **AWS** and **Azure**, and have led initiatives integrating AI/ML capabilities for enhanced data processing solutions. With a solid foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, I focus on building robust, secure applications that adhere to compliance standards like **HIPAA**, **FHIR**, **PCI DSS**, and **SOC 2**. Additionally, I have hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
